description:
In order to release Jiyu from the burden of becoming Yagyu Jubei and being targeted by the Ryujoji, Shiro challenges her to a duel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kinou no Mikata ga Teki Datta
Les alliés d`hier deviennent les ennemis d`aujourd`hui
My Next Enemy is Yesterday`s Ally
昨日の味方が敵だった
